title: Handle a Medical Emergency
description: A staff member reports that a guest has collapsed and requires medical attention.

tasks.description: Get the exact location of the patient.
Dispatch the in-house EMT/paramedic team to the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an urgent dispatch to the medical team.

tasks.description: Dispatch a security team to clear a path for the medical team and create a privacy perimeter.
If directed by the medical team, call 911 for an ambulance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts external emergency services and provides a clear access point for them.
